11014 - Balaram Pur Adarsha College ,Panchagar 1 It is to be notified all concerned that roll numbers who have passed in all subjects in the 8th Semester Regular (2010 Regulation) Examination of DIPLOMA IN  ENGINEERING, 2020
held in Feb-Mar, 2021 and Jul, 2021 are listed below in accordance with the notification no. 57.17.0000.301.31.002.20.135  dated 31-08-2021 in regulation of the board.
200058 (3.10) 200104 (3.12)624034 (2.92)
Bangladesh Technical Education Board
Office of the Controller of Examinations
Agargaon, Sherebangla Nagar, Dhaka-1207 NOTICEMemo No. 57.17.0000.301.31.002.20.135
Date : 31-08-2021
Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 September, 2021. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 September, 2021, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.  
                           ( M A S Kawsar Sarker)
                       Deputy Controller of Examination
                Bngladesh Technical Education Board, Dhaka
                                    Phone: 9118776  (Engr. Md. Abdur Rahman)
Controller of Examinations
Bangladesh Technical Education Board, Dhaka - 1207 Phone 9113283
Memo No.  57.17.0000.301.31.002.20.135                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Date :  31-08-2021
Copy of the published result is hereby sent for information and necessary action please:
1.              Director General, Directorate of Technical Education, Agargaon, Dhaka -1000
2.              Vice Chancellor, Ahsanullah University of Science and Technology, Dhaka 
3.              Director (PIW) Directorate of Technical Education Dhaka
4.              Director (Curriculum), Bangladesh Technical Education Board, Dhaka -1207
5.              Secretary Bangladesh Technical Education Board, Dhaka -1207
6.              Director, Dhaka International University, Dhaka
7-51.        Principal, Polytechnic Institute
52-56.      Principal, BS Polytechnic Institute, Kaptai /Mohila Polytechnic Institute, Dhaka/Institute of Glass and  Ceramic/Graphics Arts Institute/Bangladesh Marine Institute

board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 September, 2021. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 September, 2021, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.     (Engr. Md. Abdur Rahman)Controller of Examinations

board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 September, 2021. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 September, 2021, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.     (Engr. Md. Abdur Rahman)Controller of Examinations

board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 September, 2021. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.

2020 held in Feb-Mar, 2021 and Jul, 2021 are listed below in accordance with the notification no. 57.17.0000.301.31.002.20.135  dated 31-08-2021 in regulation of the board. The roll
numbers are listed under the respective subject in which the corresponding student has failed. These examinees are permitted to appear in the next Semester board final examination
with the specified subjects of this Semester.

Office of the Controller of Examinations
Agargaon, Sherebangla Nagar, Dhaka-1207 NOTICEMemo No. 57.17.0000.301.31.002.20.135
Date : 31-08-2021
Note: 
1. The result is hereby published subject to the final approval of the Bangladesh Technical Education Board. If any inadvertent error/mistake is detected later on in the result, the
board as per rule holds the authority of correcting / altering / withdrawing the result at any time. Any comments from the Head of Institutes regarding the published result should be
reported in written within 12 September, 2021. No complain will be entertained after the expiry of the stipulated time.
2. The withheld student must have to clear their withheld status within 12 September, 2021, otherwise they will not get admit card for next examination. After clearing the withheld
status the overall result of the candidates will be published and their candidature in the next examination will be decided accordingly.
